name: Prof. Chinchillidae’s Music Academy VR
description:
You are in a music class, the president is a chinchilla and the other lecturers are cats you have to make happy.

You use the riddles to explore! Once all puzzles are solved, the result of your hard work is given to you – the song you helped construct and a Totally Legitimate Music Degree Certificate is handed to you. The song is available to download for free and the certificate is offered as a printable
